content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ this pattern is included in the just two seams collection finch v-neck crochet cardigan pattern - cozy simplicity for every skill level embrace comfort and style with the finch v-neck crochet cardigan pattern a delightful blend of simplicity and sophistication this easy-to-follow pattern offers a super simple approach to creating a wardrobe staple that you ll love to wear again and again two lengths are included in the pattern - cropped and hip-length **features ** **easy v-neck design ** the finch cardigan features a flattering v-neckline adding a touch of elegance to your everyday wardrobe **etched half doubles crochet stitch ** crafted with the etched half doubles crochet stitch this cardigan boasts a delightful texture reminiscent of knitting but with the cozy warmth of crochet **simple row repeat ** the easy-to-memorize row repeat makes this pattern perfect for crocheters of all skill levels allowing you to create a stunning fabric with ease **provincial tweed yarn ** worked with provincial tweed yarn this cardigan offers a softness you ll love stitching creating a fabric that s as comfortable as it is stylish **size-inclusive ** this pattern is size-inclusive ranging from xs to 5x ensuring that everyone can create their own custom-fit cardigan **video tutorial ** access our comprehensive video tutorial for step-by-step guidance and visual demonstrations making it easy to follow along and complete your project with confidence **guided diagrams ** each section of the pattern is accompanied by detailed diagrams offering clarity and precision throughout the construction process **size range xs to 5x** **materials needed ** yarn wecrochet provincial tweed 1 1 015 1 150 1 175 1 225 1300 1450 1600 1 750 1800 yds for the crop length 1 225 1 300 1 450 1 750 1 900 2 000 2 250 2 500 2 750 yds for hip-length crochet hook 2 4 5 mm tapestry needle 3 stitch markers 4 scissors 5 **level beginner** **pattern includes ** written instructions guided diagrams stitch chart schematic video tutorial cheers -
